com.example.bot.spring

Class CouponDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bot.spring.CouponDB

  • public class CouponDB
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is going to connect to the psql database and change/get the data in coupon table
    Since:
    2017-11-18

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CouponDB() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean check_available(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to check the user list whether a user can get the coupon or not It depends on the message stored in the follow and coupon column in the user list table
      static java.lang.String check_code(java.lang.String code)
      This function is going to check the coupon code in coupon table If exist return the user id If not exist return null
      static boolean delete_code(java.lang.String code)
      This function is going the delete the coupon code in the coupon table(the whole role)
      static boolean delete_id(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to delete the coupon table's row with the given user id It will delete all the rows with the given user id
      private static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      This function is going to get connection to the psql in heroku
      static boolean insert_code(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String code)
      This function is going to insert a coupon code into the coupon table with the user id

    • Method Detail

      • insert_code

        public static boolean insert_code(java.lang.String id,
                                  java.lang.String code)
        This function is going to insert a coupon code into the coupon table with the user id
        Parameters:
        id - The user id
        code - The coupon code
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value to tell wether the insert is succeed

      • check_code

        public static java.lang.String check_code(java.lang.String code)
        This function is going to check the coupon code in coupon table If exist return the user id If not exist return null
        Parameters:
        code - The coupon code to check in the coupon table
        Returns:
        id The user id found in the coupon table corresponding to the coupon code

      • check_available

        public static boolean check_available(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to check the user list whether a user can get the coupon or not It depends on the message stored in the follow and coupon column in the user list table
        Parameters:
        id - the user id to search the row in the user list table
        Returns:
        result A boolean value, if succeed, return true, else return false

      • delete_code

        public static boolean delete_code(java.lang.String code)
        This function is going the delete the coupon code in the coupon table(the whole role)
        Parameters:
        code - The coupon code in oder to search the row in the coupon table
        Returns:
        result A boolean value to tell whether the delete is completed or not

      • delete_id

        public static boolean delete_id(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to delete the coupon table's row with the given user id It will delete all the rows with the given user id
        Parameters:
        id - The user id in order to search in the coupon table
        Returns:
        result A boolean value whether the delete is completed or not

      • getConnection

        private static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                          throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                 java.sql.SQLException
        This function is going to get connection to the psql in heroku
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
